param.name: inputFilename
param.help: Full path to input file or, for the case of REF_APP_WhiteCCDLocationPSF, input directory

param.name: validityStart
param.help: Validity start date for the output file (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.SSS])

param.name: validityStop
param.help: Validity end date for the output file (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.SSS])

param.name: ccdTemperature
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_QE: CCD temperature in Kelvin corresponding to the QE measurement

param.name: endOfLife
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_Throughput: Set to true to use optical throughput at end of life rather than at beginning of life

param.name: singleTemperaturePSF
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_[Oversampled][White|Coloured]PSF: Set to true if the PSF is provided for a single temperature rather than for four thermal cases

param.name: psfTemperature
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_[Oversampled][White|Coloured]PSF: Temperature corresponding to the PSF

param.name: oversampledPsf
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_[Oversampled][White|Coloured]PSF: Flag to indicate whether or not the input PSF is spatially oversampled

param.name: ltan
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_StrayLight: Local Time of Ascending Node of satellite orbit used for stray light file: 6am or 6pm

param.name: altitude
param.help: Applicable to REF_APP_StrayLight: Altitude of satellite orbit in km used for stray light file

param.name: Applicable to REF_APP_StrayLight: pointingRA
param.help: RA of pointing direction for stray light file in radians

param.name: Applicable to REF_APP_StrayLight: pointingDec
param.help: Declination of pointing direction for stray light file in radians

param.name: Applicable to REF_APP_Jitter: jitterOffset
param.help: Omit the first jitterOffset seconds from the jitter file
